NAME

Dist::Zilla::MintingProfile::FFI - A minimal Dist::Zilla minting profile for FFI

VERSION

version 0.03

SYNOPSIS

 dzil new -P FFI Foo::FFI

DESCRIPTION

This is a Dist::Zilla minting profile for creating FFI::Platypus bindings. It uses a reasonable template and the [@Starter] or [@Starter::Git] bundle plus some FFI specific plugins.

SEE ALSO

FFI::Platypus
[@Starter]
[@Starter::Git]

AUTHOR

Graham Ollis <plicease@cpan.org>
